check.name: ContributorNamePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Contributor Name concept exists.
check.code: def call(): global output global status # Message is set when an error occurs. output = "The concept ContributorName is present." if(len(ContributorName) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True status = "FAILURE" output = "ContributorName concept is not present" return False
